Title: Enacts the mental health integration for networked data (MIND) act
Summary: Establishes a centralized mental health data reporting and integration platform to be utilized by all state-operated and county-administered mental health programs, as well as all providers licensed or funded by the state for the provision of mental health services.
LawCode: Add ยง5.10, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing a statewide reporting and integration program for public mental health service providers
